Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server

Class ServerLogger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.server.ServerLogger
public class ServerLogger
extends Object
Singleton logger. Used to log useful infos from the server. To function correctly, PrintStream must be set using setPrintStreams(PrintStream, PrintStream...). This class does not close any PrintStream.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ServerLogger getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the class.
    void printAnswerMessage​(Answer message, IClientConnection connection)
    Prints necessary logs about Answer messages.
    void printRequestMessage​(Request message, String playerName, String color)
    Prints necessary logs about Request messages.
    void printString​(String string)
    Prints a formatted string to the console.
    void setPrintStreams​(PrintStream required, PrintStream... others)
    Sets the PrintStream (at least one) where each info will be print to.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • setPrintStreams

      public void setPrintStreams​(PrintStream required, PrintStream... others)
      Sets the PrintStream (at least one) where each info will be print to.
      Parameters:
      required - Required one
      others - Optional ones

    • getInstance

      public static ServerLogger getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the class. If there is none, one is created.
      Returns:
      Singleton instance of the class.

    • printAnswerMessage

      public void printAnswerMessage​(Answer message, IClientConnection connection)
      Prints necessary logs about Answer messages. It includes ANSI color. Details about the content of the message are included too.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be logged.
      connection - Sender of the message.

    • printString

      public void printString​(String string)
      Prints a formatted string to the console.
      Parameters:
      string - String to be printed.

    • printRequestMessage

      public void printRequestMessage​(Request message, String playerName, String color)
      Prints necessary logs about Request messages. It includes ANSI color. Details about the content of the message are included too.
      Parameters:
      message - Message to be logged.
      playerName - Name of the message recipient.
      color - Color of the message recipient (ANSI).
